column4: Anyone noticing high swap usage on a rather vanillia 11.04 desktop install?
does iostat show substantial load on the swap partition?
not now, iowait is 1% as well.  this machine is rather chill, just sits at work for irc, personal email, ssh home.  it is just peculiar to see swap fill up like that.
if the machine is performing fine, i wouldn't worry about it :-)
